name: A Shield's Path: A Felix Hugo Fraldarius Visual Novel (Demo)
name_original: A Shield's Path: A Felix Hugo Fraldarius Visual Novel (Demo)
description:
Demo for A Shield's Path: A Felix Hugo Fraldarius Visual Novel. Covers Day 1 and Night 1 of the story. Best enjoyed in fullscreen mode (click on the lower right button after you press Run Game!)

Follow us on Twitter! @ShieldsPath

--

Note: There are still some minor bugs we have to iron out, but in case you find anything, please feel free to shoot us a DM with regard to it!

--
